channel.title: Real Drawings/Paintings/Sketches
channel.description:
Anyone here do any drawing in real life? I've recently started taking Art (mandatory at my high school), and our teacher is pretty good at getting people to improve, although he's a homework nazi. Anyways, post your favorite drawing here.
Mine:
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/5/12/14/f_27102007166m_316be41.jpg&srv=img37][IMG]http://img37.picoodle.com/img/img37/5/12/14/f_27102007166m_316be41.jpg[/img][/URL]
Off-topic: First post I've made in a year or something. Just thought I'd come for a visit. Some of you guys might know me.

item.title: Real Drawings/Paintings/Sketches
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

[quote=“Sepranem, post:14, topic:164660”]@dragonus18: Thanks

@goatee: Thanks. It’s basically the first time I’ve taken a drawing seriously, and it went pretty smoothly. Like you said though, the creases were a bitch to get right (or at least close).

@exps35: Lol, hey. Long time no see, eh? Anyways, it depends on what you enjoy more/is easier for you. Art requires more natural talent than photography in my opinion (which is why I suck at it). If I had the choice, I’d probably take photography; I seem to have more fun taking photos.

@brownsymcard: Why? Are you having a hard time viewing it? It was hosted on imageshack first, but FastBawlz and dragonus18 couldn’t view it, so I switched over to picoodle.[/quote]

Oh my bad. I had thought picoodle was the place it was originally hosted where people could not view it.

Read full topic

item.title: Real Drawings/Paintings/Sketches
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

killerman93:

I have seen better work, but if your not that good at art and don’t go to a school specialized for art and performing art, then you have done a really good job.

Well, let me put it this way: my drawing (I’m ok with digital art) has always been resembling a little kid’s cartoon. And no, I go to an average high school, no specializations.

@dragonus+fastbawlz: Better?

Read full topic

item.title: Real Drawings/Paintings/Sketches
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

exe626:

That’s pretty damn good. I like the use of the lines. I wish my art teacher would allow us to do shit like that.

Thanks. Well, it’s probably an even trade-off, because our art teacher (whom we only have classes with once a week) likes to give us new full-scale projects every other week.

[quote=“brownsymcard, post:3, topic:164660”]Amazing

This is far from the type of art I normally do or view, so I don’t really have much to critique or criticize. Great job adding depth to it without the use of any perspective.

I do need to ask though, what is that of the large half moon area of black right around his/hers/its knees? It just looks a bit irregular to me.

I do occasionally do sketches in my notebooks of some abstract stuff which i might scan and upload. No one of it special, just the results of my boredom or ideas for something to make on PS.[/quote]

Thanks; I didn’t really think it was that great, but it might just be because I expect a lot of myself. The half-moon was supposed to be the shadow cast from the crease of the robe that’s between the knees. It was hard for me to get it to give off the right feel, but this is as close as I got. And be sure to upload those sketches when you get a chance, I’d like to see 'em.

dragonus18:

i cant see it, any help?

Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Real Drawings/Paintings/Sketches
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

Amazing

This is far from the type of art I normally do or view, so I don’t really have much to critique or criticize. Great job adding depth to it without the use of any perspective.

I do need to ask though, what is that of the large half moon area of black right around his/hers/its knees? It just looks a bit irregular to me.

I do occasionally do sketches in my notebooks of some abstract stuff which i might scan and upload. No one of it special, just the results of my boredom or ideas for something to make on PS.

Read full topic
